post.title: i need help with radio fre san andreas!
post.content: i'm total noob and i dunno how to use it could someone write an easier guide to using it then what is on the website i don't know what compiling is and i also don't know how to do it the websites explanation is way hard (to me)! and i cant' find any videos of people using it. just videos of people downloading san andreas come up every time i search for it. if someone could help i would really love a reply. thanks for reading anyway.
